__e: We're all sorry, but the best thing you can do now, son, is to put it to bed and give it our best shot tomorrow, huh?
So you just have to put that in a box or behind you or somewhere and forget about it, and never, ever speak of this again.
But sometimes the best thing to do when you love someone and it's not right is to just let go and move on.
The point is I'll forget it... if I get the right price.
I haven't forgotten what we had, but how can I forget that I'm a mother? How can I leave this house?
And whatever you were doing, you wanted to forget about it.
